UPDATE t_party_dues
user_id = #{userId},
pay_period = #{payPeriod},
pay_amount = #{payAmount},
remark = #{remark},
record_flag = #{recordFlag},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
`pay_time` = STR_TO_DATE(#{payTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),
`update_time` = STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
record_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{recordTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
mapper.select: SELECT record_id, record_flag, user_id, DATE_FORMAT(pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') pay_time, pay_amount, DATE_FORMAT(record_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') record_time, remark, updator_id, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time, pay_period, user_name, user_nickname, user_sex, updator_name FROM ( SELECT t1.* , t2.user_name, t2.user_nickname user_nickname, t2.user_sex, t3.user_name updator_name FROM (SELECT * FROM t_party_dues WHERE record_id = #{recordId}) t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user t3 ON t1.updator_id = t3.user_id ) t
